message: Raise your hand toward the ceiling.
Lower your hand toward the floor.
Draw a large plus sign in the air in front of you.
Draw a large “X” in the air in front of you.
Point straight in front of you and draw a spiral that slowly gets wider and wider, until you are drawing a large circle.
Touch your opposite shoulder.
Touch your belly.
Pick up the cup in front of you and slowly take a sip of water. Once you are done set the cup down (1 of 3).
Pick up the cup in front of you and slowly take a sip of water. Once you are done set the cup down (2 of 3).
Pick up the cup in front of you and slowly take a sip of water. Once you are done set the cup down (3 of 3).
Eat one of the items of food in front of you (1 of 3).
Eat one of the items of food in front of you (2 of 3).
Eat one of the items of food in front of you (3 of 3).
Pretend to bite your nails for a few seconds (1 of 3).
Pretend to bite your nails for a few seconds (2 of 3).
Pretend to bite your nails for a few seconds (3 of 3).
Pretend to smoke a cigarette for a few seconds (1 of 3).
Pretend to smoke a cigarette for a few seconds (2 of 3).
Pretend to smoke a cigarette for a few seconds (3 of 3).
Pretend to pluck hair from your eyebrow for a few seconds (1 of 3).
Pretend to pluck hair from your eyebrow for a few seconds (2 of 3).
Pretend to pluck hair from your eyebrow for a few seconds (3 of 3).
Pretend to pick your nose by rubbing your nostril for a few seconds (1 of 3).
Pretend to pick your nose by rubbing your nostril for a few seconds (2 of 3).
Pretend to pick your nose by rubbing your nostril for a few seconds (3 of 3).
Pretend to pluck your hair or scratch your scalp ABOVE your ear for a few second (1 of 3).
Pretend to pluck your hair or scratch your scalp ABOVE your ear for a few second (2 of 3).
Pretend to pluck your hair or scratch your scalp ABOVE your ear for a few second (3 of 3).
Pretend to pluck your hair or scratch your scalp BEHIND your ear for a few seconds (1 of 3).
Pretend to pluck your hair or scratch your scalp BEHIND your ear for a few seconds (2 of 3).
Pretend to pluck your hair or scratch your scalp BEHIND your ear for a few seconds (3 of 3).
Pretend to pick your skin on your OPPOSITE cheek for a few seconds (1 of 3).
Pretend to pick your skin on your OPPOSITE cheek for a few seconds (2 of 3).
Pretend to pick your skin on your OPPOSITE cheek for a few seconds (3 of 3).
Touch your chin, and while touching your chin, draw a circle with your same elbow.  Keep rotating for 30 seconds.
Touch the outside of your nostril and draw a circle with your elbow for 30 seconds.
Touch the outside of your cheek and draw a circle with your elbow for 30 seconds.
Touch your eyebrow and draw a circle with your elbow for 30 seconds.
Touch ABOVE your ear and draw a circle with your elbow for 30 seconds.
Touch BEHIND your ear and draw a circle with your elbow for 30 seconds.
Touch the top of your forehead at your hairline and draw a circle with your elbow for 30 seconds
Touch the top of your head and draw a circle with your elbow for 30 seconds.
Touch the back of your head and draw a circle with your elbow for 30 seconds.
Run your hand up and down the OPPOSITE side of your face for 30 seconds.
Paint three circles AROUND your mouth, without touching your mouth (1 of 3).
Paint three circles AROUND your mouth, without touching your mouth (2 of 3).
Paint three circles AROUND your mouth, without touching your mouth (3 of 3).
Paint three circles AROUND your eyebrow, without touching your eyebrow (1 of 3).
Paint three circles AROUND your eyebrow, without touching your eyebrow (2 of 3).
Paint three circles AROUND your eyebrow, without touching your eyebrow (3 of 3).
Paint three circles AROUND the area of scalp ABOVE your ear, without touching that area of the scalp (1 of 3).
Paint three circles AROUND the area of scalp ABOVE your ear, without touching that area of the scalp (2 of 3).
Paint three circles AROUND the area of scalp ABOVE your ear, without touching that area of the scalp (3 of 3).
Paint three circles AROUND the area of scalp BEHIND your ear, without touching that area of the scalp (1 of 3).
Paint three circles AROUND the area of scalp BEHIND your ear, without touching that area of the scalp (2 of 3).
Paint three circles AROUND the area of scalp BEHIND your ear, without touching that area of the scalp (3 of 3).
Paint three circles AROUND your OPPOSITE cheek, without touching your cheek (1 of 3).
Paint three circles AROUND your OPPOSITE cheek, without touching your cheek (2 of 3).
Paint three circles AROUND your OPPOSITE cheek, without touching your cheek (3 of 3).
